title: 2019-20 NBA Season Preview: Three Bold Predictions, Title Picks, MVP, and More | The Mismatch
description:
We speed through the last pieces of preseason news—Zion’s knee, contract extensions, Michael Jordan's comments, and Klay Thompson's timeline (1:30)—before diving headfirst into the 2019-20 season with three bold predictions (41:42). Then, finally, we run down our predictions for the championship and the NBA regular-season awards (56:45).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
